name: London Taxi License for iPhone
description:
This is a 3D Taxi Cab Driving Game. Racing around London City you must earn your taxi driving license by completing a series of increasingly challenging tasks! Dodge and weave through traffic, making sure to stick as close to the rules as you can. If you crash, you'll fail, and if you cross a red light, you'll be fined, so be careful!

3D London Taxi License is a fun, gorgeous-looking 3D driving game, with realistic game play and one of the best car driving simulators around.
